packageMeta.name: purescript-uri
packageMeta.description: A type-safe parser, printer, and ADT for URLs and URIs.

declarations.comments: The user info part of an `Authority`. For example: `user`, `foo:bar`.
declarations.title: UserInfo

declarations.comments: The scheme part of an absolute URI. For example: `http`, `ftp`, `git`.
declarations.title: URIScheme

declarations.comments: An alias for the most common use case of resource identifiers.
declarations.title: URIRef

declarations.comments: The path part for a relative reference.
declarations.title: URIPathRel

declarations.comments: The path part for a generic or absolute URI.
declarations.title: URIPathAbs

declarations.comments:
A general URI path, can be used to represent relative or absolute paths
that are sandboxed or unsandboxed.
declarations.title: URIPath

declarations.comments: A generic URI
declarations.title: URI

declarations.comments: A relative reference for a URI.
declarations.title: RelativeRef

declarations.comments: The "relative part" of a relative reference.
declarations.title: RelativePart

declarations.comments: The query component of a URI.
declarations.title: Query

declarations.comments: A port number.
declarations.title: Port

declarations.comments: A host address.
declarations.title: Host

declarations.title: Fragment

`localhost:3000`, `user@example.net`
